013package org.apache.juneau.svl;
014
015import static org.apache.juneau.internal.ArgUtils.*;
016import static org.apache.juneau.internal.StringUtils.*;
017import java.util.*;
018
019/**
020 * A subclass of {@link DefaultingVar} that simply pulls values from a {@link Map}.
021 *
022 * <ul class='seealso'>
023 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="../../../../overview-summary.html#juneau-marshall.jm.SimpleVariableLanguage">Simple Variable Language</a>
024
025 * </ul>
026 */
027@SuppressWarnings("rawtypes")
028public abstract class MapVar extends DefaultingVar {
029
030   private final Map m;
031
032   /**
033    * Constructor.
034    *
035    * @param name The name of this variable.
036    * @param m The map to pull values from.
037    */
038   public MapVar(String name, Map m) {
039      super(name);
040      assertArgNotNull("m", m);
041      this.m = m;
042   }
043
044   @Override /* Var */
045   public String resolve(VarResolverSession session, String varVal) {
046      return stringify(m.get(varVal));
047   }
048}
